scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && pnpm run generate-icons && npm run ensure-dist
scripts.build: pnpm run build:js && pnpm run build:types && pnpm run ensure-types
scripts.build:js: pnpm run build:esm && pnpm run build:cjs
scripts.ensure-types: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');if(!fs.existsSync(path.join(__dirname,'dist','index.d.ts'))){console.log('Types not found, copying template...');fs.copyFileSync(path.join(__dirname,'index.d.ts.template'),path.join(__dirname,'dist','index.d.ts'));console.log('Types copied from template!');}else{console.log('Types file exists!');}"
